Control.IsEnabled: Whether the control is enabled (can be clicked)
Layout.HorizontalAlignment: Horizontal alignment within the parent container
Layout.VerticalAlignment: Vertical alignment within the parent container
TextBlock.Text: Text displayed in the TextBlock element
TextBox.Text: Text entered by the user in the field
TextBox.PlaceholderText: Placeholder text shown when input is empty
TextBox.IsReadOnly: Whether the text field is read-only
CheckBox.Content: Text displayed next to the checkbox
CheckBox.IsThreeState: Whether the checkbox supports a third (indeterminate) state
ComboBox.SelectedIndex: Index of the selected item in the list
ComboBox.IsDropDownOpen: Whether the ComboBox dropdown is open
Children.One: This element can contain one nested element.
Children.Many: This element can contain multiple nested elements.
Children.NoOne: This element cannot contain nested elements.
